registers.name: TYPE
registers.description: The MPU Type Register indicates how many regions the MPU support. Software can use it to determine if the processor implements an MPU.

fields.name: SEPARATE
fields.description: Indicates support for separate instruction and data address maps. RAZ. Armv7-M only supports a unified MPU

fields.name: DREGION
fields.description: Number of regions supported by the MPU. If this field reads-as-zero the processor does not implement an MPU.

fields.name: IREGION
fields.description: Instruction region. RAZ. Armv7-M only supports a unified MPU.

fields.name: ENABLE
fields.description: Enables the MPU.

enumeratedValues.name: MPU_DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: The MPU is disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: MPU_ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: The MPU is enabled.

fields.name: HFNMIENA
fields.description: Controls whether handlers executing with priority less than 0 access memory with the MPU enabled or with the MPU disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Disables the MPU for these handlers.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Use the MPU for memory accesses by these handlers.

fields.name: PRIVDEFENA
fields.description: no description available

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Disables the default memory map. Any instruction or data access that does not access a defined region faults.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Enables the default memory map as a background region for privileged access. The background region acts as region number -1. All memory regions configured in the MPU take priority over the default memory map.

fields.name: REGION
fields.description: Indicates the memory region accessed by MPU_RBAR and MPU_RASR.

fields.name: REGION
fields.description: On writes, can specify the number of the region to update. On reads, returns bits[3:0] of MPU_RNR.

fields.name: VALID
fields.description: On writes, indicates whether the region to update is specified by MPU_RNR.REGION, or by the REGION value specified in this write. When using the REGION value specified by this write, MPU_RNR.REGION is updated to this value.

enumeratedValues.name: IGNORE_RBAR_REGION
enumeratedValues.description: Apply the base address update to the region specified by MPU_RNR.REGION. The REGION field value is ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: USE_RBAR_REGION
enumeratedValues.description: Update MPU_RNR.REGION to the value obtained by zero extending the REGION value specified in this write, and apply the base address update to this region.

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Base address of the region.

registers.name: RASR
registers.description: MPU Region Attribute and Size Register.

fields.name: ENABLE
fields.description: Enables this region.

enumeratedValues.name: DISABLED
enumeratedValues.description: When the MPU is enabled, this region is disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: ENABLED
enumeratedValues.description: When the MPU is enabled, this region is enabled.

fields.name: SIZE
fields.description: Indicates the region size. The region size, in bytes, is 2**(SIZE+1). SIZE field values less than 4 are reserved, because the smallest supported region size is 32 bytes.

fields.name: SRD
fields.description: Subregion Disable. For regions of 256 bytes or larger, each bit of this field controls whether one of the eight equal subregions is enabled. SRD[0-7]=0 - subregion enabled. SRD[0-7]=1 - subregion disabled.

fields.name: B
fields.description: Memory type attribute B. The TEX[2:0], C, and B bits together indicate the memory type of the region.

fields.name: C
fields.description: Memory type attribute C. The TEX[2:0], C, and B bits together indicate the memory type of the region.

fields.name: S
fields.description: For Normal memory regions, the S bit indicates whether the region is shareable. For Strongly-ordered and Device memory, the S bit is ignored.

enumeratedValues.name: NON_SHAREABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Non-shareable memory.

enumeratedValues.name: SHAREABLE
enumeratedValues.description: Shareable memory.

fields.name: TEX
fields.description: Memory type attribute TEX. The TEX[2:0], C, and B bits together indicate the memory type of the region

fields.name: AP
fields.description: The AP[2:0] bits indicate the access and privilege properties of the region.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_ACCESS
enumeratedValues.description: Any access generates a permission fault.

enumeratedValues.name: PRIVILEGED_ACCESS
enumeratedValues.description: Privileged access only.

enumeratedValues.name: UNPRIVILEGED_READ_ACCESS
enumeratedValues.description: Any unprivileged write generates a permission fault (Priviledge read/write, unprivileged read-only).

enumeratedValues.name: FULL_ACCESS
enumeratedValues.description: Full access

enumeratedValues.name: PRIVILEGED_READ_ONLY
enumeratedValues.description: Privileged read-only access.

enumeratedValues.name: READ_ONLY
enumeratedValues.description: Privileged and unprivileged read-only access.

enumeratedValues.name: READ_ONLY_2
enumeratedValues.description: Privileged and unprivileged read-only access.

fields.name: XN
fields.description: The XN bit is an Execute Never bit, that indicates whether the processor can execute instructions from the region.

enumeratedValues.name: EXECUTE
enumeratedValues.description: Execution of an instruction fetched from this region permitted.

enumeratedValues.name: EXECUTE_NEVER
enumeratedValues.description: Execution of an instruction fetched from this region not permitted.

fields.name: REGION
fields.description: On writes, can specify the number of the region to update. On reads, returns bits[3:0] of MPU_RNR.

fields.name: VALID
fields.description: On writes, indicates whether the region to update is specified by MPU_RNR.REGION, or by the REGION value specified in this write. When using the REGION value specified by this write, MPU_RNR.REGION is updated to this value.

enumeratedValues.name: USE_RBAR_REGION
enumeratedValues.description: Update MPU_RNR.REGION to the value obtained by zero extending the REGION value specified in this write, and apply the base address update to this region.

fields.name: ADDR
fields.description: Base address of the region.
